plot: Ever since she was little, Ritsuko Hanauchi has had a bad leg, resulting in her walking differently than the other kids. She longs to make friends at her school, but between her teasing classmates and her overprotective mother, actually doing so proves difficult. Despite these hardships, with the aid of her physical therapist Mr. Ishibashi, Ritsuko pushes forward in the hopes of finally being accepted by her peers.
